question: Arrange the following compounds in their decreasing order of reactivity towards Nucleophilic addition reaction.
<katex>$CH_{3}COCH_{3}, CH_{3}COC_{2}H_{5}, CH_{3}CHO$</katex>
explanation: Aldehydes are more reactive than ketones due to less steric hindrance and less positive inductive effect.
Among ketones, steric hindrance reduces reactivity. <katex>$CH_3COCH_3$</katex> (less hindered) > <katex>$CH_3COC_2H_5$</katex>.
